readme:
# MDBP: atom-markdown-book-preview MarkdownAtom Vivliostyle ViewerInDesignXML ## - CSS - HTMLMarkdown - svgimg - HTMLHTML - Vivliostyle Viwer - - InDesignXML ### Version 2.0 Atom[Live Server](https://www.npmjs.com/package/live-server) WebChromeMarkdownWeb AtomPDFMarkdown ![](docimg-6.png) ## ![](docimg-1.png) ![](docimg-7.png) ### Start Live Server / Stop Live Server Live Server ### Open HTML preview CSSHTMLVivliostyle ![](docimg-3.png) ### Open Vivliostyle Preview VivliostyleMarkdownVivliostyle Viewerviwer ![](docimg-4.png) - Vivliostyle Viewer https://vivliostyle.org/download/ ### Print PDF PDFWebWebPDF Ver.2.0WebPDF ### Export InDesign XML InDesignXMLXMLInDesign ## 2018/01/09Download Template`_template.html``_postReplaceList.json``css/booksample.css`3 ### CSS`_template.html`CSSMarkdown`_template.html` ```html doc <%=content%> ``` ### `_postReplaceList.json`JSON @div @divenddiv ``` [ { "f": "@div:([a-z|0-9 ]+)", "r": "

" }, ``` ### IT ``` ![](sample.png?svgimg=30,180,200,-10,-10) ?svgimg=,mm,mm,mm,mm ``` 0 ### ## ~~`_template.html``_css`Markdown_home.path../../~~ ~~~~ Ver.2.0viewer`_home.path` ## postManipulate MarkdownHTML@div:secheader@divendMarkdownjQuerycheerioh2pdiv _postManipurate.json ``` [ { "selector": "h1", "method": "wrapWithNextSib", // h11div.coverpage "paramator": "
